list.abs: soil protecting plant 土壤保护植物soil respiration 土壤呼吸soil science 土壤学
细胞呼吸（cellular respiration）是指有机物在细胞内经过一系列的氧化分解，生成二氧化碳或其他产物，释放出能量并生成ATP的过程。
农业专业英语词汇(A) ... aerobic purification 好气性净化 aerobic respiration 需氧呼吸 aerobiology 高空生物学.
有关生理卫生的成语 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... Articular cartilage 关节软骨 Artificial respiration 人工呼吸 Asbestos 石棉.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French respirer or Latin respirare 'breathe out', from re- 'again' + spirare 'breathe'

means.word_mean: 1. breathe easily again, as after exertion or anxiety
2. undergo the biomedical and metabolic processes of respiration by taking up oxygen and producing carbonmonoxide
3. draw air into, and expel out of, the lungs;

sentences.sentence: "I can breathe better when the air is clean"

auth_sentence.content: I did respire the lonely auras sweet.
auth_sentence.res_content: I did respire the lonely auras sweet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I did respire the lonely auras sweet.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热心的,积极的,有抱负的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aspire[v.[to,after]渴望,追求,有志于]+ing表形容词→adj.热心的,积极的,有抱负的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: spirit精神+ed……的→adj.精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
spirit精神+ual……的→adj.精神[上]的,心灵的
conspire[v.阴谋,同谋,谋叛]+acy表名词→n.阴谋,密谋,共谋
expire[v.期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡]+ation表名词→n.期满,终止
inspire[v.鼓舞,激起;使产生灵感]+ation表名词→n.灵感;鼓舞,激励
spir呼吸,精神+it名词→n.精神;志气;[n.]情绪,心情;[n.]酒精
a加强+spir呼吸,精神+e→看到希望的东西加强呼吸→渴望,追求
dis去掉+pirit=spirit精神→去掉精神→使沮丧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pire=spir呼吸→有出气没进气→断气
in进入+spir呼吸,精神+e→吸气进去→引申为鼓励
per全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
trans改变,交流+spir呼吸,精神+e→互相呼吸→transpire泄漏
